attributes.action: Did Theresa May lie to the Queen? Has she obtained her job through deception?
attributes.background:
There's been several news reports which say Her Majesty the Queen was left furious after Theresa May allegedly deceived the Queen over her ability to form a Government.

We call Parliament to debate & take evidence from journalists, the PM, her aides and staff so we can find out what happened.

rejection.details: Petitions need to call on the Government or Parliament to take a specific action.
